markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grippli Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=2817) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Grippli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=264" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are well versed in grippli culture and tactics. You gain the trained proficiency in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Grippli Lore](/Traits.aspx?ID=264).
name: Grippli Lore
